title: wine_DanCin_2013_Chassé_Chardonnay_(Dundee_Hills)
text:
Unnamed: 0: 117843.
country: US.
description: This splendid effort is sourced from the Durant Vineyard, and aged in neutral French oak for seven months prior to bottling. Spicy and dense, it's a lively blend of lime, apple, apricot and pear fruits. A trickle of juicy acidity pulls the flavors through into a finish with streaks of vanilla and clove. The 20-year-old vines provide the complexity and detail that will reward another decade of aging. Drink now through 2025..
designation: Chassé.
points: 94.
price: 29.0.
province: Oregon.
region_1: Dundee Hills.
region_2: Willamette Valley.
taster_name: Paul Gregutt.
taster_twitter_handle: @paulgwine .
title: DanCin 2013 Chassé Chardonnay (Dundee Hills).
